item.title: A few paradoxes of Gauss' law and how to avoid them
item.description: arXiv:2412.08373v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present a few charge distributions for which the application of Gauss' law in its integral form, as typically outlined in standard textbooks, results in a contradiction. We identify the root cause of such contradictions and put forward a solution to resolve them.
item.dc:creator: Marcin Ko\'scielecki, Piotr Nie\.zurawski
